name: Dicey Space Shooter
description:
Dicey Space Shooter

Introduction

"Dicey Space Shooter" is a 2D Sc"roll" shooter game : P

 Capture enemy lower than you to be empowered and defeat the boss!

Control

 Move - Arrow Keys

 Capture Shooting: Space  (Note that enemy with larger number can't be captured after being hit by capture bullet )

R - Reset game
